data.message: There should be a feature as a drag-down under each post that would allow the owner to pause a conversation, preventing anyone from adding further to the post.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback Alexin! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo -Hailey
I am a Thai man. I live in Thailand. I'm not so good in English . Most of my objectives to be in your group. I want to improve my English from you then. Thank you.
